programme.title: India Unplated S1
programme.desc: The episode starts with Helly's Dal Dhokli, a traditional Gujarati dish made with lentils as the base for the curry and the dhokli is made with wheat flour making it a wholesome dish. We then have Adam's Dal Risotto followed by Sandeep's Dal Pakwan, one of Gujarat's most amazing breakfast dish.

programme.title: Field Trip With Curtis Stone S2
programme.desc: Curtis heads to Maui to explore the local cuisine. He starts with a visit to a taro root farm to process their staple food, Poi. Diving into the culture, Curtis journey's through the forest with local hunters to hunt wild boar which are considered invasive species to the Hawaiian Islands. Curtis sets out to sea with famed chef, Isaac Bancanco, to make Lau Laus. And Curtis can't resist a trip to the beach where he meets some local surfers and lunches on their favorite grinds, Ulua Lau Laus.

programme.title: Field Trip With Curtis Stone S2
programme.desc: We revisit the countries where Curtis journeyed this season revealing the food and adventures never seen. While in New South Wales, Curtis discovers Caribbean rum made from Australian sugar cane. And in Victoria, Curtis takes a stroll through an extraordinary sculpture garden at Mornington Peninsula. Later, things get edgy when Curtis takes on knife making. To end his adventure, Curtis meets up with Maggie Beer at her farm where they chase pheasants and cook a family style meal.

programme.title: Make Every Move Count
programme.desc: Reaching your silver years doesn't mean an automatic downgrade in health and strength. Seniors who stay active can maintain strength, balance and flexibility to keep doing the activities they enjoy. Dr Teoh Chin Sim talks about why it's important for seniors to exercise, and Active Health coach Christabelle talks about exercise, nutrition and sleep. Bonus - laugh along with Irene Ang and Chua Enlai (but get the message).

programme.title: Modern Marvels: Food
programme.desc: Modern Marvels goes straight for the taste buds in an all-compassing celebration and exploration of food. Celebrated food expert Adam Richman crisscrosses the country taking a deep dive into how food products are made, detailing both the process of the craft and the inspiration behind the ideas.

programme.title: Field Trip With Curtis Stone S2
programme.desc: Curtis meets up with local fisherman, Justin Lee, to do some spearfishing off the coast of Kona. And he entrenches himself in the family culture of the islands, where he helps cook the caught fish for a Hawaiian style bbq with Justin's family. There, he learns the art of making poke with a genuine poke master. And later, Curtis discovers the islands have their own special cowboys known as Paniolos. Curtis learns to rope and hunt and bbq's with the ranch beef with chef, Matt Rasos.

programme.title: Don't Forget the Lyrics USA S6
programme.desc: The hit music game show is back! Just like in the original version, one contestant must attempt to sing through and fill in the missing lyrics to TEN of the biggest hit songs of all time! But when the music stops, the contestant must correctly provide the missing song lyrics. If a contestant can successfully make it through the first 9 songs without missing a SINGLE lyric, they'll have the chance to play a 10th and final song for a shot at ONE MILLION DOLLARS!

programme.title: ila 部落住一晚 S2
programme.desc: (PG) 这一集，民雄将带着世界羽球球后戴资颖，以及她的冠军教练团一起快乐游茂林啰～这趟旅行的第一天，他们将到访两台湾唯一三星级生态景观“茂林紫蝶幽谷”寻找四种紫斑蝶，冲进得恩谷的天然划水道享受炎夏的清凉！再跟着当地专家夜探自然生态！ (听说小戴发现台湾斑龟) 。第二天再去认识台湾唯一国定万山岩雕遗址，走访东南亚最高的吊桥看周边大自然美景，并热热闹闹的大逛多纳市集，吃遍茂林区的美食小吃！除了这些，还有小戴及教练群们温暖的对话，以及被民雄大哥逗到笑歪了的笑容！.

programme.title: 放下
programme.desc: Tony今年43岁，目前的职业是救护车司机，共有3段婚姻。他自小在复杂环境中长大，爸爸混黑社会、妈妈爱钱如命，他深受双亲影响，求胜心强及很爱钱。他中学时期开始收保护费，然后又吸大麻和冰毒，渐渐也开始贩毒,为了赚更多钱，他的生活从此离不开毒品，赌博，女人和非法勾当，20几岁就因吸毒而被捉，而且连第一段婚姻也赔上，但他还不知悔改，出狱后继续贩毒赚钱，后来又再进出牢房，家人屡劝不听，最后才因为有了信仰而"放下"一切，踏踏实实地工作和生活，帮助还在毒海的人悔改，以及回馈社会，担任志工帮助独居老人。.
